name: Jim Hankey
text: Hungry Howie's (or, Hungry Nitwits, as my spell check often calls it) is a weakness of mine. I cannot claim that theirs is high-quality food, but, dang, it's delicious. I usually get double pepperoni and bacon, with sesame seed crust. Mmm-mmm!
